epics.title: User Authentication and Authorization
epics.summary: Implement user authentication and authorization features.
epics.description: Develop the user authentication and authorization system using Next.js on the frontend and Node.js on the backend. Include features like user registration, login, logout, and role-based access control. Use PostgreSQL to store user credentials securely.

epics.title: Database Schema Design
epics.summary: Design the database schema to support the e-commerce functionality.
epics.description: Create the database schema using PostgreSQL to support various aspects of the e-commerce website. This includes tables for users, products, categories, orders, and other necessary entities. Ensure proper relationships and indexing for efficient data retrieval.

epics.title: Basic UI Layout
epics.summary: Create the basic user interface layout for the e-commerce website.
epics.description: Develop the basic UI layout using Next.js. This includes the main navigation, header, footer, and overall design framework for the e-commerce platform.

epics.title: Product Catalog
epics.description: Develop the product catalog feature using Next.js for the frontend and Node.js for the backend. This includes displaying products with their details, filtering, and sorting options. Ensure that the product information is retrieved from the PostgreSQL database.

epics.title: Shopping Cart
epics.description: Implement the shopping cart feature using Next.js on the frontend and Node.js on the backend. Users should be able to add products to the cart, update quantities, and remove items. The cart state should be stored in PostgreSQL for persistence.

epics.title: Checkout and Payment Gateway Integration
epics.summary: Integrate a payment gateway and develop the checkout flow.
epics.description: Develop the checkout flow using Next.js and Node.js, and integrate a payment gateway (such as Stripe). This includes order review, payment processing, and order confirmation. Ensure that the order information is stored in PostgreSQL.

epics.title: Order Management
epics.summary: Implement order management features for users and administrators.
epics.description: Develop the order management system using Next.js for the frontend and Node.js for the backend. Users should be able to view their order history, and administrators should be able to manage and update order statuses. All order data should be stored in PostgreSQL.

epics.title: User Profile and Account Management
epics.summary: Implement features for user profile and account management.
epics.description: Develop user profile and account management features using Next.js and Node.js. Users should be able to update their personal information, change passwords, and manage their accounts. Ensure that user information is securely stored and retrieved from PostgreSQL.

epics.title: Product Reviews and Ratings
epics.summary: Add the ability for users to leave reviews and ratings for products.
epics.description: Implement a product review and rating system using Next.js for the frontend and Node.js for the backend. Users should be able to leave reviews and ratings for purchased products. Store review data in PostgreSQL and display it on the product detail pages.

epics.title: Analytics and Reporting
epics.summary: Integrate analytics and generate reports for the e-commerce platform.
epics.description: Develop analytics and reporting features using Next.js and Node.js. This includes tracking sales, user behavior, and other key metrics. Generate reports to provide insights into the performance of the e-commerce website.
